title: Score these real-time translation earbuds for under $90 this Black Friday!
content:
Macworld

The internet may have made the world smaller metaphorically, but technology still hasn’t done much to help when it comes to people from different countries meeting IRL. That is, until the Mymanu CLIK S earbuds arrived.

Not only are these superior audio tech, but they can translate your speech into one of 37 languages, opening a whole new world of communication with over 2 billion people worldwide. Through December 3 and ahead of Black Friday, you can score these translation earbuds for only $89.97 (reg. $157)!

To translate, you simply pair the Mymanu CLIK S with the MyJuno app, speak clearly, and the earbuds will help you speak and write in Spanish, German, French, and other supported languages. This proprietary speech translation technology made the Mymanu CLIK S an honoree for the 2019 CES Innovation Award!

They’re compatible with Apple and Android, and can deliver up to 30 hours of hi-fi audio when you’re not making new friends. Plus, they’re designed to be comfortable, coming with various-sized memory foam ear tips for a custom fit, are water-resistant, and offer voice assistance from Siri or Google (depending on the device they’re paired with).

Enjoy early Black Friday savings on the award-winning Mymanu CLIK S Translation Earbuds, now just $89.97 through December 3 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific. No coupon is necessary to score this exclusive offer!

 

Mymanu CLIK S: Award-Winning Translation Earbuds – $89.97
